DOC.brief_summary: The aim vivo study evaluate influence apical periodontitis ( AP ) accuracy Dentaport ZX , Raypex 5 , i-Root electronic root canal length measurement device .
DOC.brief_title: Accuracy ERCLMDs Teeth With Apical Periodontitis
DOC.detailed_description: Thirty-two single-rooted teeth schedule extraction , consist 16 teeth AP 16 teeth normal periapex ( NP ) , select . Access cavity prepare coronal portion canal flare . Electronic work length ( EWL ) determine ERCLMD accord manufacturer 's instruction . Each tooth extract actual working length ( AWL ) determine insert size 15 K-file tip could see position tangential major foramen 0.5 mm subtract measurement . The distance AWL file tip calculate compare two group t-test . The accuracy ERCLMD within Â±0.5 mm compare group Fisher 's test . Statistical significance set P < .05 .
